title: T206 Brown Hindu Herzog for Sale
author: Kingcobb

posts.post_title: T206 Brown Hindu Herzog for Sale
posts.post_content:
I am thinning out some of my T206 commons that are not graded and thought I would start here and see how it goes. Brown Hindu Herzog nice front with rounded corners a crease in the middle right that's hard to see in the scan. Looking for $300 shipped. Paypal or postal money order. 

Thanks Daryl


If you would like a bigger and better scan send me your email.
